Lab 6 - Ansible AS3
Paso 1: Playbook para crear una App Basica

body.raw:
---

- name: Create a VIP, pool and pool members
  hosts: all
  connection: local

  vars:
    provider:
      password: admin
      server: 10.1.1.245
      user: admin
      validate_certs: no
      server_port: 443

  tasks:
    - name: Create a pool
      bigip_pool:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        lb_method: ratio-member
        name: pool_web_ansible
        slow_ramp_time: 120
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Add members to pool
      bigip_pool_member:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        description: "webserver {{ item.name }}"
        host: "{{ item.host }}"
        name: "{{ item.name }}"
        pool: pool_web_ansible
        port: 80
      with_items:
        - host: 10.1.20.10
          name: web01
        - host: 10.1.20.12
          name: web02
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Create a VIP
      bigip_virtual_server:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        description: foo-vip
        destination: 10.1.10.222
        name: vip_web_ansible
        pool: pool_web_ansible
        port: 80
        snat: Automap
        profiles:
          - http
          - clientssl
      delegate_to: localhost

request.description:
Ir a server Linux Ubuntu
Correr ansible-playbook -i inventory/hosts playbook1.yaml
Verificar el BIG-IP

item.name: Paso 2: Playbook para borrar la App Basica

body.raw:
---

- name: Remove VIP, pool, pool members and nodes
  hosts: all
  connection: local

  vars:
    provider:
      password: admin
      server: 10.1.1.245
      user: admin
      validate_certs: no
      server_port: 443

  tasks:
    - name: Destroy a VIP
      bigip_virtual_server:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: vip_web_ansible
        state: absent
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Destroy a pool
      bigip_pool:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: pool_web_ansible
        state: absent
      delegate_to: localhost

    - name: Delete nodes
      bigip_node:
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
        name: "{{ item }}"
        state: absent
      loop:
        - web01
        - web02
      delegate_to: localhost

request.description:
Ir a server Linux Ubuntu
ansible-playbook -i inventory/hosts undo-playbook1.yaml
Verificar el BIG-IP

item.name: Paso 3: Playbook para crear App con AS3

body.raw:
---

- name: Deploy an App using AS3
  hosts: all
  connection: local

  vars:
    provider:
      password: admin
      server: 10.1.1.245
      user: admin
      validate_certs: no
      server_port: 443
      timeout: 60

  tasks:
    - name: Deploy an AS3 configuration
      bigip_appsvcs_extension:
        content: "{{ lookup('file', '{{ playbook_dir }}/ansible-as3.json') }}"
        state: present
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
      delegate_to: localhost

request.description:
Ir a server Linux Ubuntu
ansible-playbook -i inventory/hosts playbook-as3.yaml
Verificar el BIG-IP

item.name: Paso 4: Playbook para borrar App con AS3

body.raw:
---

- name: Remove a Tenant using AS3
  hosts: all
  connection: local

  vars:
    provider:
      password: admin
      server: 10.1.1.245
      user: admin
      validate_certs: no
      server_port: 443
      timeout: 60

  tasks:
    - name: Remove tenant from AS3 configurations
      bigip_appsvcs_extension:
        tenants:
        - ACME_cloud_ANSIBLE
        state: absent
        provider: "{{ provider }}"
      delegate_to: localhost

request.description:
Ir a server Linux Ubuntu
ansible-playbook -i inventory/hosts playbook-as3.yaml
Verificar el BIG-IP
